steps.conclusion: Violates the explicit rule for language exams: the title must be exactly the exam name. The suggestion uses "Preparação para o TOEFL" instead of "TOEFL". Expectations also warned against prep-style titles (e.g., "Preparatório para o TOEFL"), and this is effectively the same issue. Consequently, the english_title derived from the incorrect title ("TOEFL Preparation") also deviates from the expected exam-name-only form.
None. Single suggestion provided, is_language_course is true, includes a tabler icon, Portuguese language used correctly, title length within 5 words, no forbidden joiners or level words.
Use the exact exam name as the title: "TOEFL". Set english_title to "TOEFL". Keep is_language_course=true and maintain a concise Portuguese description and a tabler icon.
